summary: An email forwarding a complaint about threats made to the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund. The forwarded message identifies Allison Huxtable as the individual making threats and mentions an unnamed female overseer of the fund.

persons.name: Nevin
persons.role: Supervisory Special Agent FBI NY - Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: Recipient of the forwarded email about threats to the Epstein Compensation Fund, asked to reach out to the complainant.

persons.name: Allison Huxtable
persons.context: Identified in the forwarded message as the person who has been making threats to the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund.

events.title: Report of threats to Epstein Compensation Fund
events.description: An individual reports receiving threats related to the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund, identifying Allison Huxtable as the source.

keyFacts: Threats were made against the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund in August 2021.
Allison Huxtable is identified as the individual making the threats.
The complaint was forwarded to FBI Supervisory Special Agent Nevin of the Violent Crimes Task Force in New York.
An unnamed female individual oversees the applications for the fund and was the initial point of contact for the complaint.
